## asyncMap() function

异步遍历 https://github.com/Kevnz/async-tools/blob/master/src/mapper.js https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global\_Objects/Array/<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->iterator

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function asyncMap<T, R>(
  list: Array<T>,
  mapper: (val: T, idx: number, list: Array<T>) => Promise<R>,
  concurrency?: number
): Promise<R[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                                                               | Description                     |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------- |
| list        | Array&lt;T&gt;                                                     |                                 |
| mapper      | (val: T, idx: number, list: Array&lt;T&gt;) =&gt; Promise&lt;R&gt; |                                 |
| concurrency | number                                                             | _(Optional)_ 并发数量，默认无限 |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;R\[\]&gt;
